title: New to PBE

replies.body:
Ranked isn't usually activated due to the super long queue times.
I think the only SR queues available atm on Pbe are blind pick and coop-AI.

About a month before preseason there will be a time when only ranked will be enabled on the Pbe, at that time the queue times are short and only 1 game places you.  They lock out all other queues during that time so that they can get enough people playing ranked to test season rewards stuff.

When you play ranked games on the PBE servers, it won't affect your regular ranked placements. We do allow summoners to play ranked games on the PBE servers in order to test particular changes that may have only been changed in ranked games. 

As far as it's accuracy, you still get ranked normally just like the normal servers. Ranked games played on the PBE servers do **_NOT_** effect your normal ranked games.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KYwwpgKs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-24T01:44:26.459+0000)
>
> When you play ranked games on the PBE servers, it won't affect your regular ranked placements. We do allow summoners to play ranked games on the PBE servers in order to test particular changes that may have only been changed in ranked games. 
> 
> As far as it's accuracy, you still get ranked normally just like the normal servers. Ranked games played on the PBE servers do **_NOT_** effect your normal ranked games.

Hi, I'm also new to PBE ^_^ and have had a difficult time trying to figure out how to use the PBE Boards. My account was raised to level 30 upon creation a week ago but anytime I try to use the boards it tells me "You are not authorized... Must be level 1." Is there a fix for this?
